TopicTitle: B9's docking port doesnt line up with the nav ball?

Articles.Content:
just download B9 aerospace pack and when i tried to dock the stock plane with my station...but the nav ball pink mark was so misplaced making it impossible to dock with the navball and forced me to eyeball the two docking port (and using docking cam as well)

is it just me running in this problem?

or is it B9's inline port has this issue innately?

(well...i controlled from the station because the plane's battery was dead)

---

(yes of cos i clicked control from here and targeted the port; i aint newbie who just downloaded the game...registered April 2012if you look a little left...)

Edited July 29, 2013 by lammatt
I can't say that I've had a problem because I haven't used B9 with .21 yet, however you would likely find better support if you posted this in the add-ons section of the forums.

It's a problem with KSP, not the B9 pack. The navball points in the direction of the part you're controlling from, but looking from the centre of the craft, not the part. An offcentre docking port will as a result not line up correctly when trying to dock using the navball - you've got to do it by eye
